Articles.Content:
I've had this account but been lurking for over a year now (mostly using the reddit). But recently with 1.0, I've become reinvigorated with the game and have started getting into modding.

So hello and see you all around!
Welcome aboard, I can't wait to see what you come up with!
Welcome! I don't use mods, but do like seeing others use mods - especially on YouTube. Hope to see some of your work!

I can't code worth spit.

But kudos to you!

Also, all these new members remind me of a John LeCarrÃƒÂ¨ book: The Lurker That Came in From the Cold
